traits.name: Pounce.
traits.desc: If the allosaurus moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the allosaurus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

traits.name: Illumination.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious.
traits.desc: The frog can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Standing Leap.
traits.desc: The frog's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

actions.name: Swallow.
actions.desc: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

traits.name: Charge.
traits.desc: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Sure-Footed.
traits.desc: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Rampage.
traits.desc: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath.
traits.desc: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Underwater Camouflage.
traits.desc: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

traits.name: Water Breathing.
traits.desc: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
actions.desc: A 20- foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb.
traits.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense.
traits.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker.
traits.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Ranged Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

traits.name: Running Leap.
traits.desc: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 feet.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Trampling Charge.
traits.desc: If the mammoth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell.
traits.desc: The mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Beast of Burden.
traits.desc: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

traits.name: Sure-Footed.
traits.desc: The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath.
traits.desc: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

traits.name: Underwater Camouflage.
traits.desc: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

traits.name: Water Breathing.
traits.desc: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
actions.desc: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Flyby.
traits.desc: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight.
traits.desc: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell.
traits.desc: The panther has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce.
traits.desc: If the panther moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath.
traits.desc: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 5 (2d4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Keen Smell.
traits.desc: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Flyby.
traits.desc: The pteranodon doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy.
traits.desc: The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Water Breathing.
traits.desc: The quipper can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell.
traits.desc: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Mimicry.
traits.desc: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Pack Tactics.
traits.desc: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Water Breathing.
traits.desc: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge.
traits.desc: If the rhinoceros moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell.
traits.desc: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce.
traits.desc: If the tiger moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 9 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Water Breathing.
traits.desc: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Spider Climb.
traits.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense.
traits.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker.
traits.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 9 Constitution saving throw or take 2 (1d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 (1d4 + 3) hit points due to blood loss. The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge.

traits.name: Echolocation.
traits.desc: The swarm can't use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: Keen Hearing.
traits.desc: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Swarm.
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Melee Weapon Attack
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: 5 (2d4) piercing damage, or 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
actions.targets: one creature in the swarm's space.

traits.name: Swarm.
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.targets: one target in the swarm's space.

Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

traits.name: Trampling Charge.

If the target is prone, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.
